movie.title: War Machine
movie.plot: A general from the US is sent to Afghanistan to 'clean' the situation up after eight years of war in the country. He finds himself amongst tired soldiers and disillusioned politicians eager to leave. In this situation he feels his mission is to 'win' the war, something deemed impossible by everyone around him.

events.title: the Rolling Stone article "The Runaway General" is published
the General's report is leaked to the public
